metadata.title: CVE-2018-5848 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: In the function wmi_set_ie(), the length validation code does not handleunsigned integer overflow properly. As a result, a large value of the'ie_len' argument can cause a buffer overflow in all Android releases fromCAF (Android for MSM, Firefox OS for MSM, QRD Android) using the LinuxKernel.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
